author: timgraham
message:
Updated static file example in overview to use static template tag, refs #19675.

Thanks jezdez for the note.

files.patch: @@ -271,17 +271,18 @@ Finally, Django uses the concept of "template inheritance": That's what the following blocks." In short, that lets you dramatically cut down on redundancy in templates: each template has to define only what's unique to that template. -Here's what the "base.html" template, including the use of :doc:`static files +Here's what the "base.html" template, including the use of :doc:`static files `, might look like: .. code-block:: html+django + {% load static %} {% block title %}{% endblock %} - + {% block content %}{% endblock %}
